name: doc-now
description: **Appinty** is a full-stack web application designed to make healthcare more accessible by simplifying the process of booking doctor appointments. It offers three levels of login: **Patient**, **Doctor**, and **Admin**, each with distinct features tailored to their roles. The app integrates **online payment gateways (Stripe and Razorpay)** to facilitate seamless and secure payments. Built using the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js), Appointy provides an efficient, user-friendly experience for both patients and healthcare providers.
